mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM NOTICE WHERE N_STATUS='Y' AND N_SORT IN ('공통','일반')
SELECT * FROM NOTICE WHERE N_STATUS='Y' AND N_SORT IN ('공통','일반') ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(N_NO,2)) DESC
SELECT * FROM NOTICE WHERE N_NO=#{nNo} AND N_STATUS='Y'

SELECT * FROM NOTICE WHERE TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(N_NO,2))=(SELECT MAX(TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(N_NO,2))) FROM NOTICE WHERE TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(N_NO,2)) < TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(#{nNo},2)) AND N_STATUS='Y' AND N_SORT IN ('공통','일반'))

SELECT * FROM NOTICE WHERE TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(N_NO,2))=(SELECT MIN(TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(N_NO,2))) FROM NOTICE WHERE TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(N_NO,2)) > TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(#{nNo},2)) AND N_STATUS='Y' AND N_SORT IN ('공통','일반'))
